title: Novel Plasma Wakefield Acceleration Experiments
abstract: We report on recent plasma wakefield acceleration experiments achieving record energy gains. The experimental setup, plasma characterization, and beam quality measurements are presented along with future upgrade plans.
category: MC3: Novel Particle Sources and Acceleration Techniques

title: Machine Learning Applications in Accelerator Controls at DESY FLASH
abstract: This work explores the application of machine learning techniques for accelerator control systems. We demonstrate automated beam tuning, anomaly detection, and predictive maintenance capabilities with significant operational improvements.
category: MC6: Beam Instrumentation, Controls, Feedback and Operational Aspects

title: Machine Learning Applications in Accelerator Controls at DESY FLASH
abstract: This work explores the application of machine learning techniques for accelerator control systems. We demonstrate automated beam tuning, anomaly detection, and predictive maintenance capabilities with significant operational improvements.
category: MC6: Beam Instrumentation, Controls, Feedback and Operational Aspects

title: Collective Effects and Instabilities in High-Intensity Beams
abstract: This study investigates collective effects and beam instabilities in high-intensity accelerators. We analyze impedance sources, mitigation techniques, and feedback system requirements for stable high-current operation.
category: MC7: Accelerator/Storage Ring Physics

title: Cryogenic System Optimization for Superconducting Accelerators
abstract: This paper describes optimization strategies for cryogenic systems in superconducting accelerator facilities. We present energy efficiency improvements, cost reduction methods, and reliability enhancements based on operational experience.
category: MC4: Hadron Accelerators

title: Beam Dynamics Studies for the FRIB Upgrade
abstract: We present comprehensive beam dynamics studies for the proposed upgrade of FRIB. The studies include lattice optimization, collective effects analysis, and beam-beam interaction simulations for enhanced luminosity performance.
category: MC5: Beam Dynamics and Electromagnetic Fields

title: Novel Plasma Wakefield Acceleration Experiments
abstract: We report on recent plasma wakefield acceleration experiments achieving record energy gains. The experimental setup, plasma characterization, and beam quality measurements are presented along with future upgrade plans.
category: MC3: Novel Particle Sources and Acceleration Techniques

title: High-Gradient Superconducting RF Cavity Development for DESY FLASH
abstract: This paper presents the development of high-gradient superconducting RF cavities for next-generation accelerator facilities. We discuss cavity design optimization, surface treatment techniques, and performance measurements achieving gradients exceeding 50 MV/m.
category: MC2: Photon Sources and Electron Accelerators

title: Advanced Beam Position Monitor Development
abstract: We present the development of next-generation beam position monitors with nanometer-level precision. The design incorporates novel electronics, advanced signal processing, and calibration techniques for ultra-stable beam position measurements.

title: Medical Accelerator Technology Transfer and Clinical Applications
abstract: We discuss the technology transfer of accelerator innovations to medical applications. The paper covers compact accelerator designs, dose delivery systems, and clinical implementation of advanced radiotherapy techniques.
category: MC8: Applications of Accelerators, Technology Transfer and Industrial Relations
